Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
-- selected bankacount, arguments for OPH106C
-- Uses to obain BADT (Option 2, if v.PO.BADT_EXISTS = FASLE)
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Initially check how many bankaccounts are available to call OPH106C
(triggers handling of option 2 -->single BNKA row exist or option 3 -->
multiple BNKA rows exists
-- Option 2: One bankaccount selected
-- The requested BADT row (OPH106C) does not exists --> v.PO.BADT_EXISTS=FALSE
then select first BADT row and call OPH106C
-- Leave program
-- Option 3: Multiple bankaccounts selected
... a bankaccount is selected, call OPH106C, else leave program
-- The requested BADT row (OPH106C) does not exists --> v.PO.BADT_EXISTS=FALSE
then select first BADT row and call OPH106C
-- Call selection screen again, to enable the users to select an other
bankaccount
-- In case of not bankaccounts available, leave program, see also T.S. where the
users get a message
-- No bankaccount selected, give message
-- Check if one or multiple BNKA rows exists (see EndTask condition)
-- One bankaccount row selected, if more selected, then variables will be set
back to 0/blank, see below if v.Counter = 2
... call OPH106C in parent task, for the selected bankaccount
-- Multiple bankaccounts selected, do not call OPH106C but open a sreen
where the users could select on bankaccount, see parent task
... open selection screen in parent task, because of mult selected bankaccounts
-- Uses special SORT on descending BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT to get
max(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT)
.. uses to call OPH106C in parent task, if a BADT rows is selected

DisplayName.val: Date of last received daily statement
Number of last received daily statement

Text.val: -- Update arguments to call OPH106C in parent task

ColumnTitle.valUnicode: Date of last received daily statement
Number of last received daily statement
